ml.alternet.security.auth.formats

Class CurlyBracesCryptFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • ml.alternet.security.auth.formats.CurlyBracesCryptFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CryptFormat

    @Singleton
public class CurlyBracesCryptFormat
extends Object
implements CryptFormat
    The scheme of this format appears in curly braces.

    Examples :

    • Contains the password encoded to base64 (just like {SSHA}) : 
      {SSHA.b64}986H5cS9JcDYQeJd6wKaITMho4M9CrXM
    • Contains the password encoded to hexa : 
      {SSHA.HEX}3f5ca6203f8cdaa44d9160575c1ee1d77abcf59ca5f852d1
    SSHA : Salted SHA
    Author:
    Philippe Poulard

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CurlyBracesCryptFormat.CryptFormatter
      Crypt formatter for {scheme}hash and {scheme.encoding}hash.
      static class  CurlyBracesCryptFormat.CryptFormatterWrapper<T extends CryptParts>
      A wrapper around another formatter, for handling composed crypts such as {CRYPT}$1$gwvn5BO0$3dyk8j.UTcsNUPrLMsU6/0
      static class  CurlyBracesCryptFormat.IterativeSaltedFormatter 
      static class  CurlyBracesCryptFormat.SaltedCryptFormatter
      Salted crypt formatter for {scheme}hash and {scheme.encoding}hash.
      static class  CurlyBracesCryptFormat.SchemePart
      Focus on the parts in curly braces.
